age: Numerical variable. Age of the patient in years.
cp: Categorical variable. Chest pain type (1: typical angina; 2: atypical angina; 3: non-anginal pain; 4: asymptomatic).
trestbps: Numerical variable. Resting blood pressure in mmHg (measured at admission).
chol: Numerical variable. Serum cholesterol level in mg/dl.
fbs: Binary variable. Fasting blood sugar > 120 mg/dl (1 = true; 0 = false).
restecg: Categorical variable. Resting electrocardiographic results (0: normal; 1: ST-T wave abnormality; 2: left ventricular hypertrophy).
thalach: Numerical variable. Maximum heart rate achieved during exercise test.
exang: Binary variable. Exercise-induced angina (1 = yes; 0 = no).
oldpeak: Numerical variable. ST segment depression induced by exercise relative to rest (in millimeters).
slope: Categorical variable. Slope of the peak exercise ST segment (1: upsloping; 2: flat; 3: downsloping).
ca: Numerical variable. Number of major vessels (0-3) colored by fluoroscopy.
thal: Categorical variable. Thallium perfusion status (3: normal; 6: fixed defect; 7: reversible defect).
target: Binary variable. Diagnosis of heart disease (0 = absence; 1 = presence).
